name: Healing Animal
description:
Depart on a trip with Anna, who lost her sight, to help cute animal friends and escape the dark reality.


Nid, who leads Anna in an unstable world, is a mysterious tree that shrunk for reasons unknown. Help Nid grow into its original state.


You'll face various problems in the town as a character that transforms into animals. Relax by helping Anna heal her emotional wounds that spread like darkness through reality.
